response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the high-quality craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that could potentially increase in value over time. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 7500}
